snippet: Novak Djokovic withdrew from the final of the Mubadala World Tennis Championships in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, handing Andy Murray his first title of the season.
abstract: Novak Djokovic withdraws from Mubadala World Tennis Championships final because of shoulder pain, handing Andy Murray his first title of season.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic withdrew from the final of the Mubadala World Tennis Championships in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, handing Andy Murray his first title of the season.

headline.main: Andy Murray Wins Title as Novak Djokovic Withdraws
headline.print_headline: Title to Murray as Djokovic Withdraws
